original_text: Now if the ministry that brought death, which was engraved in letters on stone, came with glory, so that the Israelites could not look steadily at the face of Moses because of its glory, transitory though it was,
korean_text: 돌에 써서 새긴 죽게 하는 율법 조문의 직분도 영광이 있어 이스라엘 자손들은 모세의 얼굴의 없어질 영광 때문에도 그 얼굴을 주목하지 못하였거든

sentences.original_text: Now if the ministry that brought death
which was engraved in letters on stone
so that the Israelites could not look steadily
at the face of Moses because of its glory
